title: I just noticed that my pixel doesn't even connect to my PC, so did anyone else faced this?
content:
I just tried getting different type C cables and tried them, but to no avail... My pixel only charges when connected and doesn't even bring the drop down system notification that would want permission to change from "charging" to "transfer files" but now I get nothing...
I tried turning the debug on and off but it's still just charging.
